snippet: In the video, a man thanks Hillary Rodham Clinton for urging the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex marriage.
abstract: In the video, a man thanks Hillary Rodham Clinton for urging the Supreme Court to rule in favor of same-sex marriage.

headline.main: Clinton’s Stance on Marriage Equality Is Promoted in Video
